response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits. We understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, which aligns perfectly with our valuation.

I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant discount, allowing you to secure this exceptional item at a more favorable rate than what it would typically command on the market.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction and value.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
